scripts.server: export DATA_VERSION=$npm_package_dataVersion && npm run dev --prefix server
scripts.build-client: export DATA_VERSION=$npm_package_dataVersion && npm run create-default --prefix runners/js && export REACT_APP_DATA_VERSION=$npm_package_dataVersion && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix runners/js/builtins && npm run compile --prefix runners/js/builtins && npm run build-client
